languages.text: Each time the Overseer uses {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g} on the target inside the area of the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm, the Servoskull Swarm itself receives +5 to all stats. An additional ally should also be present in that area for this effect to proc. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Each time the Overseer uses {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g} on the target inside the area of the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm, the Servoskull Swarm itself receives +5 to all stats. An additional ally should also be present in that area for this effect to proc. Stacks.

languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g} on an ally in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, which then also grants an additional {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to another ally in that area, the servo-skull swarm gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} применяет {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Особое поручение{/g} к союзнику в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов, предоставляя {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} еще одному союзнику в области, рой сервочерепов получает +5 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}. Суммируется.

Когда надзиратель применяет {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Особое поручение{/g} к союзнику в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов, предоставляя дополнительный ход еще одному союзнику в области, рой сервочерепов получает +5 ко всем характеристикам. Суммируется.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} einen Verbündeten in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm mit {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring es zu Ende!{/g} belegt, das dann einem weiteren Verbündeten einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} gewährt, erhält der Servoschädel-Schwarm +5 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g} on an ally in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, which then also grants an additional {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to another ally in that area, the servo-skull swarm gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Aufseher einen Verbündeten in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm mit {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring es zu Ende!{/g} belegt, das dann einem weiteren Verbündeten einen zusätzlichen Zusatzzug gewährt, erhält der Servoschädel-Schwarm +5 auf alle Eigenschaften. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} utilise {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Descendez-le !{/g} sur un allié dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes (qui octroie alors un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} à un autre allié de la zone), celui-ci gagne +5 à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g} on an ally in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, which then also grants an additional {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to another ally in that area, the servo-skull swarm gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le surveillant utilise {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Descendez-le !{/g} sur un allié dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes (qui octroie alors un tour supplémentaire à un autre allié de la zone), celui-ci gagne +5 à toutes les caractéristiques. Cumulable.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}对伺服头骨集群距离4格内的盟友使用{g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}把它干掉！{/g}时，此能力会赋予范围内的另一位盟友一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，同时使伺服头骨集群所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高5点。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g} on an ally in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, which then also grants an additional {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to another ally in that area, the servo-skull swarm gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当监察官对伺服头骨集群距离4格内的盟友使用{g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}把它干掉！{/g}时，此能力会赋予范围内的另一位盟友一个额外回合，同时使伺服头骨集群所有属性提高5点。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} usa {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}¡Derribadlo!{/g} sobre un aliado en un radio de 4 casillas del enjambre de servocráneos, lo que también otorga un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} adicional a otro aliado en la zona, el enjambre de servocráneos obtiene +5 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g} on an ally in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, which then also grants an additional {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} to another ally in that area, the servo-skull swarm gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el supervisor usa {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}¡Derribadlo!{/g} sobre un aliado en un radio de 4 casillas del enjambre de servocráneos, lo que también otorga un turno extra adicional a otro aliado en la zona, el enjambre de servocráneos obtiene +5 a todas sus características. Este efecto es acumulativo.

Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} usa {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}¡Derribadlo!{/g} sobre un aliado en un radio de 4 casillas del enjambre de servocráneos, lo que también otorga un turno extra adicional a otro aliado en la zona, el enjambre de servocráneos obtiene +5 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}がサーヴォスカル・スウォームの半径4セル以内の味方に{g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}打ち倒せ！{/g}を使用する場合、そのエリアにいる別の味方にも{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}が付与され、サーヴォスカル・スウォームはすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が+5される。この効果はスタックする。

Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 監督官がサーヴォスカル・スウォームの半径4セル以内の味方に{g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}打ち倒せ！{/g}を使用する場合、そのエリアにいる別の味方にも追加ターンが付与され、サーヴォスカル・スウォームはすべての特性が+5される。この効果はスタックする。
監督官がサーヴォスカル・スウォームの半径4セル以内の味方に{g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}打ち倒せ！{/g}を使用する場合、そのエリアにいる別の味方にも追加ターンが付与され、サーヴォスカル・スウォームはすべての特性が+5される。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki bir dost birim üzerinde {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Yere Ser!{/g} kabiliyetini kullandığında o alandaki başka bir dost birime bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandırır. Ayrıca hizmelet sürüsü tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +5 kazanır. Etki üst üste birikebilir.

Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Gözetmen, hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki bir dost birim üzerinde {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Yere Ser!{/g} kabiliyetini kullandığında o alandaki başka bir dost birime bir ek tur kazandırır. Ayrıca hizmelet sürüsü tüm niteliklerine +5 kazanır. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
